description:
Yuuto Amakawa’s life becomes pawsitively arousing when beautiful demons start showing up! But with beauty comes danger. With cat demon Himari Noihara sticking by his side, he’ll have to face the deadly Ayakashi—demons seeking revenge on demon slayers. Between this, the cat girl, water deities, and demons galore, he’ll have to do all he can to stay abreast of everything happening around him!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

name.native: リズリット・L・チェルシー

node.description:
__Height:__ 169 cm

[Profile](https://endless-glory.com/talent_ak/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/AMISUKESHIGOM)

__Non-Anime roles:__
- Yukiko Amagi - Persona 4 (VG)
- Mist - Rune Factory (VG)
- Agnès Oblige - Bravely Default (VG)
- Claire Rieveldt - Trails of Cold Steel (VG)
- Eleanor Hume - Tales of Berseria (VG)
- Perun - Xenoblade Chronicles 2 (VG)
- Yuki Takamiya - 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim (VG)
- Beidou - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Alexandria - Xenoblade Chronicles 3 (VG)
- Milady - Soul Hackers 2 (VG)
- Luke - Memento Mori (VG)
- Guillotine - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Yinlin - Wuthering Waves (VG)
- Accord - Drakengard 3 (VG)
- Zooey - Granblue Fantasy (VG)
- Hoshimi Miyabi - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)
Released her first single "Jump up!" on August 24, 2005.

__Height:__ 142cm
__Hobbies:__ mahjong, pachinko, slots
__Nickname:__ Kame-chan (かめちゃん)

[Profile (Sigma Seven)](https://www.sigma7.co.jp/prof/w_58.html) | [Official Blog](https://ameblo.jp/asu-kame/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/asu_kame) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asuka_%C5%8Cgame) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%A4%A7%E4%BA%80%E3%81%82%E3%81%99%E3%81%8B)

She is married to fellow seiyuu [Nobuhiko Okamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/95270).

__Birthplace:__ Hiroshima Prefecture, Japan
__Graduated:__ Hiroshima Prefectural High School, Toyo University

__Shinji Ushiro__ is a Japanese director, production manager and storyboard artist, who mainly does episode direction.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.
